statements: UPDATE game_settings SET music_volume = 80 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE game_settings SET sound_enabled = TRUE WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE game_settings SET notification_enabled = FALSE WHERE player_id = 3;
UPDATE game_settings SET sound_enabled=1, music_volume=80 WHERE player_id=123;
UPDATE game_settings SET theme='Dark Theme' WHERE player_id=456;
UPDATE game_settings SET notification_enabled=0 WHERE player_id=789;
UPDATE player_preferences SET sound_volume = 80 WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE player_preferences SET graphics_quality = 2 WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE game_settings SET max_players = 10 WHERE game_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE player_preferences SET sound_volume = 80 WHERE player_id = 'c22c1d4b-06c1-4102-a441-db9415da690d';
UPDATE player_preferences SET graphics_quality = 2 WHERE player_id = '9f0e9eba-44a4-4d43-a253-0da842d7bb5c';
UPDATE game_settings SET max_players = 10 WHERE game_id = '908e7338-bfee-42f1-bd49-3e810be13bf4';
UPDATE players SET age = 25 WHERE player_id = '1a2b3c'
UPDATE game_settings SET resolution = '1920x1080' WHERE player_id = '4d5e6f'
UPDATE preferences SET language = 'French' WHERE player_id = '7g8h9i'
UPDATE players SET age = age + 1 WHERE age >= 18
UPDATE game_settings SET resolution = '1920x1080', graphics_quality = 'High' WHERE player_id = '88b8d642-39c1-4261-b150-71a6e26e894f'
UPDATE preferences SET theme = 'Dark Mode', language = 'English', notifications = true WHERE player_id = '2a63c14d-6955-4f35-8369-92f024ff8d8a'
UPDATE players SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE game_settings SET setting_value = '{"difficulty": "hard"}' WHERE setting_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE player_games SET game_score = 100 WHERE game_id = '323e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE players SET email = 'updated_email@example.com' WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE game_settings SET setting_value = '{"difficuly": "hard"}' WHERE setting_name = 'game_difficulty';
UPDATE player_games SET game_score = 1000 WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND game_name = 'Example Game';
UPDATE players SET player_score = 1500 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE games SET game_category = 'Adventure' WHERE game_id = 2;
UPDATE player_preferences SET preferred_difficulty = 'Hard' WHERE preference_id = 3;
UPDATE players SET player_score = player_score + 100 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE games SET game_difficulty = 'Intermediate' WHERE game_id = 2;
UPDATE player_preferences SET preferred_difficulty = 'Hard' WHERE preference_id = 3;
